QuestData.Title: Blood Oath of Na'Shra
QuestData.Description: You have done me a great service. This blade is as much yours as it is mine.$b$bI offer you this blood oath: I shall serve your cause and lend my knowledge of blades and mining to your forces.$b$BWill you accept it?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: New to the rank of Blademaster, Na'Shra is a formidable warrior and master of arms.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept the Blood Oath of Blademaster Na'Shra.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done me a great service. This blade is as much yours as it is mine.$b$bI offer you this blood oath: I shall serve your cause and lend my knowledge of blades and mining to your forces.$b$BWill you accept it?
